verses.roman:
sa eva śatrujid vatsa
ṛtadhvaja itīritaḥ
tathā kuvalayāśveti
prokto 'larkādayas tataḥ

synonyms: saḥ—that Dyumān; eva—indeed; śatrujit—Śatrujit; vatsaḥ—Vatsa; ṛtadhvajaḥ—Ṛtadhvaja; iti—like that; īritaḥ—known; tathā—as well as; kuvalayāśva—Kuvalayāśva; iti—thus; proktaḥ—well known; alarka-ādayaḥ—Alarka and other sons; tataḥ—from him.
translation: Dyumān was also known as Śatrujit, Vatsa, Ṛtadhvaja and Kuvalayāśva. From him were born Alarka and other sons.
